name: Volume Actual Size/Capacity
description: This PromQL query measures the actual size of Longhorn volumes, which is distinct from the filesystem size within the volumes.

name: Number Of Degraded Volumes
description: This PromQL query measures the number of volumes that have a lower number of healthy replicas compared to the expected number of replicas.
